This is gonna be way too short for me, I’m sending it back. Then I put it on and loved it! The fabric is soo soft, the color is vibrant, the material is nice and thick so you can’t see through it, and the straps and adorable. 100% worth it for the price!

Good quality for the price. The fabric is comfortable and fairly thick. The straps laid nicely without any wonky-ness, which was nice. It is very cropped, so must be worn with high waisted shorts or pants if you do not want your midriff showing.

I have worn this top every chance I could. It’s perfect all around. The color, the cut and the material is perfect! It’s very comfortable and chic. It is versatile so it can be dressed up to casually worn. The straps stay in place and the material is very nice.

I just want to ward everyone about how small these are. My granddaughter turned 11, and this was perfect for her. She is not pudgy at all. She loves it, and it certainly is cute. But be sure about the sizing. I feel it is misleading.

Ordered this for a red-themed girls night out as I didn’t own any cute red tops. I was skeptical, but I was actually pleasantly surprised! The fabric was soft and stretchy, and didn’t become see-through which is a problem I run into often with tops (the girls are both a blessing and a curse). I like that it’s simple but the ruffle straps give it a little flair. It’s pretty cropped, so just keep that in mind. I love it, and will be ordering in other colors!

It is super stretchy and soft, but the material is pretty thin making it feel more delicate than I had hoped. Overall, it is still a really cute and simple shirt and i wear it all the time!!

Ordered a small based on other reviews. The top fits fine. It's cute and a bit cropped for my 5"3" frame. I am 34C so this is not a top I would be able to wear by itself to most places. (I definitely look bustier than the other reviewer who is 34C)... Debating if I will keep.
